title: Cinnamon Rolls
steps: In large bowl mix flour, baking powder, salt.
Cut in shortening until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Add milk. Knead 6 to 8 strokes to mix thoroughly.
Pour melted butter over roll dough.
In a separate bowl, mix cinnamon and sugar for topping. Sprinkle sugar mixture over dough.
Roll up jelly roll fashion. Cut into 1" slices. Put in greased pyrex pan.
